name: Spark
slogan: Accelerated home ownership for first time buyers
description: Unique mortgages for first time buyers

jobs.title: Chief Operating Officer
jobs.description:
Join a new Fintech with mission to change home ownership with its innovative products. 

You will work alongside the CEO to execute the company vision, put procedures and resources in place to promote scaling, optimise efficiency in the organisation and oversee general daily operations. 

Our ideal COO has at least 5 years of senior experience working in finance with lending operations being a particular advantage. You should have a strong understanding of the UK operational and regulatory requirements with experience of managing teams.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Join a new Fintech with mission to change home ownership with its innovative products.

You will work alongside the CEO to execute the company vision, put procedures and resources in place to promote scaling, optimise efficiency in the organisation and oversee general daily operations.

Our ideal COO has at least 5 years of senior experience working in finance with lending operations being a particular advantage. You should have a strong understanding of the UK operational and regulatory requirements with experience of managing teams.
